version_description:
- bug fix and ui improvement
- new promo and konten menu specifically for iOS

- bug fixing
- redeem/claim benefit
- prepaid registration
- customer care link
- show Smart Point for postpaid

New version 6.0 bring these exciting new stuff :
- All New Design
- Purchase, Top Up and Pay Bill Easily
- Multiple Number Management
- Personalise Profile

+ Get a chance to Win a House, Car, and more every month
+ Now earn more Smartpoin and redeem with more offers from your favourite brands. We will soon be adding more brands on a regular basis for you.
+ A new look for you, which definitely makes it easier
+ Soon you can buy packages, top up balance, and pay bills using OVO

Don't forget to update yes!

New stuff & improvement in 6.1.2
- A new look for you, which definitely makes it easier
- Soon you can buy packages, top up balance, and pay bills using OVO*
*available soon

New stuff & improvement in 6.0.3 :
- Improve login session security
- Improve Smartplan Purchase page interface
- Improve login flow
- Fix error code upon top up
- Fix permission method to retrieve number from device
- Add "Guide/Tour" feature on initial app launch
- Code optimisation and general bugs fixing

New stuff & improvement in 6.0.4 :
- Bill Payment Interface improvement
- Smartplan Purchase Page Interface improvement
- Fix Package Purchase Notification Wording
- Add "Top Up History" feature
- Add option to use UANGKU for one time Top Up
- Add security warning on Jailbroken/Modified Device
- Code Optimisation and Bug Fixing

New stuff & improvement in 6.0.5 :
- Top up feature using UANGKU for postpaid users
- Add Promo Campaign feature
- Improve system security detection
- Improve security warning on Jailbroken/Modified Device
- Code Optimisation and Bug Fixing

New stuff & improvement in 6.1.0
- A new look for you, which definitely makes it easier
- Soon you can buy packages, top up balance, and pay bills using OVO*

*available soon

New stuff & improvement in 6.1.1
- A new look for you, which definitely makes it easier
- Soon you can buy packages, top up balance, and pay bills using OVO*
*available soon

New stuff & improvement in 6.1.2
- A new look for you, which definitely makes it easier
- Soon you can buy packages, top up balance, and pay bills using OVO*
*available soon

+ Get a chance to Win a House, Car, and more every month
+ Now earn more Smartpoin and redeem with more offers from your favourite brands. We will soon be adding more brands on a regular basis for you.
+ A new look for you, which definitely makes it easier
+ Soon you can buy packages, top up balance, and pay bills using OVO

Don't forget to update yes!

What's New on MySmartfren!
1. Optimize your iPhone with eSIM, the 1st in Indonesia
            > Enjoy dual SIM on your iPhone
            > Easy to buy eSIM & choose/change the number through MySmartfren apps
            > Only Available for iPhone XR, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max
2. New! Exclusive Plan 
            > Get Special Price Unlimited Data Package with 3 months, 6 months & 12 months subscription. MORE AFFORDABLE!
3. Get Welcoming Bonus 5GB Quota
            > Update MySmartfren Apps to the latest version (6.3.5)
            > Existing smartfren user who have not downloaded MySmartfren apps
            > This offer applies 1x for every user
4. OCR - Voucher/Data Plan Scanning

What's New on MySmartfren!
1. Optimize your iPhone with eSIM, the 1st in Indonesia
            > Enjoy dual SIM on your iPhone

            > Existing smartfren user who have not downloaded MySmartfren apps

4. OCR - Voucher/Data Plan Scanning

1. Easily buy SIM Card, eSIM, and Activate directly from mySmartfren application, order now and the SIM Card will be delivered directly to your home
> Get free premium number worth 1 million with exclusive POWER UP package for new customers, you'll get progressive bonuses up to 3GB, data rollover and buyback, plus 3% SmartPoin cashback on every transaction
> The 1st telco in Indonesia that provides dual-SIM experience on iPhone with eSIM technology. Let’s give your iPhone the best companion SIM.
2. Now you can buy packages, top up balance, and pay bills using GoPay
3. Other Exclusive Plan available for existing Smartfren subscribers.
> Save up to 5K with auto-renewal offers or enjoy 12.8K/3GB for 7 days

Don’t forget to update OK!

POWER UP - The 1st Exclusive Digital Membership Plan in Indonesia that gives you the freedom to control your digital needs with exclusive benefits:

1. Get Progressive Bonus up to 3GB in every Add-On transaction.
2. Enjoy the data rollover and buyback program.
3. Earn Cashback 3% SmartPoin with every purchase you make.
4. Choose your lucky number.
5. Easy to buy through mySF app and get your SIM card delivered directly to you.

PLAY SCRATCH 2 WIN – Win Million SmartPoin and Redeem with your favourite Prize.

WOW CASHBACK – Get cashback up to RP 30,000 for your next top-up or voucher data purchase

POWER UP – Digital membership plan Pertama di Indonesia yang memberimu kebebasan atur kebutuhan digital dengan benefit eksklusif:

• Progressive Bonus s/d 3GB di setiap transaksi Add-on
• Program Data Rollover dan buyback
• Cashback 3x SmartPoin tiap transaksi
• Pilih Nomor favorit

SCRATCH 2 WIN – Menangkan 1 JUTA SmartPoin dan tukarkan dengan hadiah favoritmu

WOW CASHBACK – Dapatkan Cashback hingga 30rb untuk pembelian voucher data atau top-up

1. Progressive Bonus s/d 3GB di setiap transaksi pembelian Add-on

2. Program Data Rollover dan buyback

3. Cashback 3% SmartPoin di setiap transaksi

4. Pilih Nomor favorit

5. Kemudahan membeli melalui aplikasi mySF serta SIM card yang diantarkan langsung ke tempatmu

Ada yang baru di mySF versi 6.16.0 khusus untuk Kamu

COBA TEKNOLOGI ESIM - Beli eSIM 90 GB langsung dari ponselmu
WOW DEALS - Promo khusus untukmu, nikmati cashback s/d 30rb
OPSI PEMBAYARAN BARU - ShopeePay, BCA VA, Simobi +, dan Sinarmas VA telah hadir!
PAKET HIBURAN - Nikmati berbagai paket hiburan untuk memenuhi agenda #stayathome mu
LEBIH BANYAK REWARDS - Dapatkan hingga 3X SmartPoin dan mainkan mini-game untuk dapat lebih banyak poin

1. Spesial promo hanya untuk Kamu
2. Rejeki WOW (Treasure Hunt Edition)
i. Mari berpetualang dan memburu rejeki bersama Kapten WOW
ii. Mulai perjalanan & dapatkan hadiah spesial
iii. Berlayar dan temukan harta karun dengan hadiah menarik setiap hari
3. Pengalaman lebih baik, perbaikan bug fix dari aplikasi, & pilihan pembayaran baru
